name: Apollo
effect: Your Move: Your Worker may move into an opponent Worker's space (using normal movement rules) and force their Worker to the space yours just left (swapping their positions).

name: Artemis
effect: Your Move: Your Worker may move one additional time, but not back to its initial space.

name: Athena
effect: Opponent’s Turn: If one of your Workers moved up on your last turn, opponent Workers cannot move up this turn.

name: Atlas
effect: Your Build: Your Worker may build a dome at any level.

name: Demeter
effect: Your Build: Your Worker may build one additional time, but not on the same space.

name: Hephaestus
effect: Your Build: Your Worker may build one additional block (not dome) on top of your first block.

name: Minotaur
effect: Your Move: Your Worker may move into an opponent Worker’s space, if their Worker can be forced one space straight backwards to an unoccupied space at any level.

name: Pan
effect: Win Condition: You also win if your Worker moves down two or more levels.

name: Prometheus
effect: Your Turn: If your Worker does not move up, it may build both before and after moving.

name: Ares
effect: End of Your Turn: You may remove an unoccupied block (not dome) neighboring your unmoved Worker. You also remove any Tokens on the block.

name: Charon
effect: Your Move: Before your Worker moves, you may force a neighboring opponent Worker to the space directly on the other side of your Worker, if that space is unoccupied

name: Hestia
effect: Your Build: Your Worker may build one additional time, but this cannot be on a perimeter space.

name: Triton
effect: Your Move: Each time your Worker moves into a perimeter space, it may immediately move again.

name: Zeus
effect: Your Build: Your Worker may build a block under itself.
